Index.title: Multilingual Courses App
Index.description: A powerful platform for managing and presenting multilingual courses in an accessible and modern way.

error.sorry: Sorry, we encountered an unexpected server issue.

Sidebar.areYouSureLogout: Are you sure you want to logout?

metadata.title: Courses Dashboard - Learn and Grow
metadata.description: Explore and manage your courses in the dashboard. Access your learning materials and track your progress.
metadata.keywords: courses, dashboard, learning, education, online courses, e-learning

MyCourses.error: Error loading courses. Please try again.
MyCourses.noCoursesDescription: You haven't enrolled in any courses yet. Start exploring and enroll in a course to begin your learning journey.

metadata.title: My Learning Journey - Track Progress and Keep Growing
metadata.description: View and manage all the courses you’ve enrolled in on Vovo. Track your learning progress, continue where you left off, and discover new opportunities to expand your knowledge and skills.
metadata.keywords: my courses, learning dashboard, enrolled courses, track progress, student portal, online education, Vovo learning, lifelong learning, course management, personal development, skill tracking

metadata.title: My Cart - Review Your Courses & Complete Enrollment
metadata.description: Review and manage your selected courses on Vovo. Update quantities, apply discounts, and seamlessly proceed to checkout to start your learning journey today.
metadata.keywords: shopping cart, course cart, checkout, enroll courses, online learning cart, Vovo cart, education platform, course enrollment, payment, learning investment, course selection, cart management

Login.title: Login
Login.subtitle: Sign in to your account
Login.passwordRequired: Password must be at least 6 characters
Login.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

metadata.title: Login - Courses App
metadata.description: Access your account to manage and track your courses.

Signup.title: Create Account
Signup.profileImagePlaceholder: Paste image URL or upload file
Signup.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
Signup.profileImageInvalid: Please enter a valid image URL

metadata.title: Sign Up - Courses App
metadata.description: Create a new account to access all features of Courses App.
metadata.keywords: signup, register, create account, courses app

Verify.title: Account Verification
Verify.subtitle: Enter the verification code sent to your email

metadata.title: Account Verification - Courses Platform
metadata.description: Verify your account by entering the 6-digit verification code sent to your email upon registration.
metadata.keywords: verification, code, account, registration, courses platform

Verify.successMessage: Your account has been verified successfully
Verify.errorMessage: Incorrect verification code, please try again

metadata.title: Welcome to Courses App - Onboarding
metadata.description: Get started with Courses App by completing your onboarding process. Select your degree and year to personalize your experience.
metadata.keywords: onboarding, courses, user setup, education, platform

Footer.copyright: © 2025 Courses App. Open source under MIT license.

Metadata.title: Multilingual Courses App - Startup Platform
Metadata.description: Courses platform with support for Hebrew, Arabic, Chinese, English, Spanish, and Japanese. Includes RTL support and theme switching.
Metadata.keywords: courses, platform, multilingual, Hebrew, Arabic, Chinese, Spanish, Japanese, RTL support
